funds.top_up_text1: You will need to have funds in your Praxis account before you can purchase tickets or play Lottery Instant games.

funds.top_up_text3: Please note that it may take a few minutes for the funds to reach your My Club Lottery account before you can purchase tickets or play Lottery Instant games.
